translation: Thus, the field, as well as knowledge and the knowable, have been briefly stated. My devotee, knowing this, enters into My being.
commentary: 13.19 is thus? the field the field? And as well as? Knowledge knowledge? knowable the knowable? f and? Uktam have been stated? Briefly in summary? My devotee: My devotee? This this? Vijnaya knowing? Madbhavaaya to My being? Uppadyate enters.Commentary He whohas controlled his mind and organs? who has the knowledge of the field and the knowable? and he who fixes his mind on Me becomes one with Me.Thus the field described
